long_description: The feather-light Sierra Designs Lightning 2 UL Tent shelters 2 backpackers through 3 seasons with a protective awning and plenty of open-air living space for cooking and outdoor views in wet weather. Hybrid double/single wall design reduces weight and provides quick setup, even in the rain. Enjoy simple, speedy and dry setup with a single hubbed shockcorded pole frame; freestanding design can be pitched anywhere-no matter how impenetrable the surface. 15-in. integrated awning provides shade and moves the drip line away from the door. The Sierra Designs Lightning 2 UL Tent features a single door that saves weight; it's extra wide and large enough for 2 people to sit side by side. Gear closets store gear where it should be-away from the door; they can be closed or left open for additional venting, yet will stay dry in a rainstorm.
